Title: Our Struggles
Actors: Romain Duris, Basile Grunberger, Lena Girard Voss, Lucie Debay
Plot: Olivier is fighting with his comrades at work against injustices, but one night his wife Laura leaves him and the kids on 9 and 6. He must now meet another struggle and face up to his new responsibilities. Can he find a new balance?
